name: Yiying Tong
content: Homepage of Yiying Tong Yiying Tong, PhD Email:	 ytong@msu.edu Professor Phone:	517-803-2234	  	Fax:	517-432-1061 Computer Science and Engineering Office:	1140 Engineering Building (Map) Michigan State University Mailing address: Engineering Building, 428 S. Shaw Lane #3115, East Lansing, MI 48824 Research interests: discrete geometric modeling, computer simulation/animation, discrete differential geometry, and applications in biometrics and biomolecular surfaces. (Google Scholar publication list) ...
